text: Pas, caro az mardumi on asrhoe, ki pes az sumo ʙudand, ahli xirad nasudand, ki az fasod dar zamin man' kunand, magar sumorai andake az onho, ki nacot dodem. Va sitamgaron cizero pajravi kardand, ki ʙa on osudagi doda sudand va ʙa lazzathoi dunjo masƣul sudand va ʙo in korason gunahkor ʙudand va noʙud sudand
